units.key: GET 类请求首字节平均时延
units.name: GET 类请求首字节平均时延

charts.name: GET 类请求首字节平均时延

query.alias: GET 类请求首字节平均时延
query.q: M::`huaweicloud_SYS.OBS`:(AVG(`first_byte_latency_average`) AS `GET 类请求首字节平均时延`) { `account_name` = '#{account_name}' and `bucket_name` = '#{bucket_name}' }
M::`huaweicloud_SYS.OBS`:(AVG(`object_num_standard_total_average`) AS `标准存储对象总数`) { `account_name` = '#{account_name}' and `bucket_name` = '#{bucket_name}' }
M::`huaweicloud_SYS.OBS`:(AVG(`object_num_infrequent_access_total_average`) AS `低频存储对象总数`) { `account_name` = '#{account_name}' and `bucket_name` = '#{bucket_name}' }
M::`huaweicloud_SYS.OBS`:(AVG(`object_num_archive_total_average`) AS `归档存储对象总数`) { `account_name` = '#{account_name}' and `bucket_name` = '#{bucket_name}' }

title: 华为云 OBS 标准存储
